com.verilion.database
Interface DatabaseInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminMenu, AdminMenuDetail, AdminPageRoutines, ArchivePage, ArchivePageEntry, Banners, CareerLocation, Careers, Comment, Components, CtCreditCard, CtLanguages, Customer, CustomerMessages, Event, Faq, FaqCategory, GenericTable, Links, LinksCategories, Menu, MenuItem, Modules, NewsCategories, NewsItem, PageRoutines, PageTemplate, Polls, Quotes, Role, RolesAssigned, Story
public interface DatabaseInterface

Define methods required for all database objects implementing this interface. The methods below are used by ProcessPerformAction.
